content: Delivering Reliable, Affordable Energy to All New Yorkers We Are The New York State Energy Research and Development Authority (NYSERDA) Our efforts aim to reduce greenhouse gas emissions, accelerate economic growth, and improve the quality of life for all New Yorkers equitably NYSERDA Celebrates 50 Years of Energy Leadership and Innovation Areas We Impact Explore the full range of our work across New York State News & Updates CASE STUDY.
